comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Applied the patch in revision 480872 after adding the ASF license headers (based on your selecting the "Grant license" option) and replacing Class.getSimpleName() since it's not included in Java 1.4.

Thanks for the contribution!

description: I needed a memory file system for my test cases. A patch for a simple implementation the works well in my environment is attached
summary: Implementation of a memory file system
